lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A bill to provide emergency disaster assistance to midwestern grain producers, already passed by the House, may not be considered by the Senate for another 10 days because members have lined up as many as two dozen amendments costing billions of dollars, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Leahy said his panel would consider changes in the wheat and feedgrains programs this year, including a proposal to establish mandatory production controls.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rudy Boschwitz (R-Minn.) and Richard Lugar (R-Ind.) is working on a proposal for assisting the Farm Credit System that Leahy said should be ready shortly after Congress's Easter recess, set for April 13 through 20.
